ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You will die and they too will die.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Verily you will die, and so will they.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (O Prophet), you are destined to die and they too are destined to die.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), you will die and all of them will also die.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) will taste death, and they (the disbelievers) too will die.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, you will die, and verily, they (too) will die.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely you shall die and they (too) shall surely die.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Thou art mortal, and they are mortal;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! thou wilt die, and lo! they will die;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: You will die and they too will die,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily thou art mortal, and verily they are mortals.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: You will die, and they [too] will die.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Truly thou wilt die (one day), and truly they (too) will die (one day).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, you (O Muhammad SAW) will die and verily, they (too) will die.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: You are mortal, and they are mortal
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: You will die, and they will die.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, you are to die, and indeed, they are to die.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [39:30] You — an address to the Prophet (s) — will indeed die, and they [too] will indeed die, and so there is no satisfaction to be gained from [another’s] death: this was revealed because they kept waiting for the Prophet (s) to die.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! thou) Muhammad (wilt die, and lo! They) i.e. the disbelievers of Mecca (will die; 533
